issues.message: Measure directory name 'Rotate Building' is not snake_case.
Could not find "def description" in measure.rb
Could not find "def modeler_description" in measure.rb
Argument display name 'Number of Degrees to Rotate Building (positive value is clockwise).' appears to have units. Set units in the setUnits method.
Argument display name 'Number of Degrees to Rotate Building (positive value is clockwise).' cannot contain ?#.[] characters.
